titles: Aleyn Mayor. At a Common-Councel holden at the Guild-hall London, on VVednesday the 23 day of November 1659
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publisher: Printed by James Flesher printer to the honourable City of London,

Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
